steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Check create file with empty filename response
Check that length of details equals to 1
Check that 'message' equals to 'String should have at least 1 character'

parameters.name: actual
parameters.value: ValidationErrorSchema(type='string_too_short', input='', context={'min_length': 1}, message='String should have at least 1 character', location=['body', 'filename'])

parameters.name: schema
parameters.value: {'$defs': {'ValidationErrorSchema': {'description': 'Модель, описывающая структуру ошибки валидации API.', 'properties': {'type': {'title': 'Type', 'type': 'string'}, 'input': {'title': 'Input'}, 'ctx': {'additionalProperties': True, 'title': 'Ctx', 'type': 'object'}, 'msg': {'title': 'Msg', 'type': 'string'}, 'loc': {'items': {'type': 'string'}, 'title': 'Loc', 'type': 'array'}}, 'required': ['type', 'input', 'ctx', 'msg', 'loc'], 'title': 'ValidationErrorSchema', 'type': 'object'}}, 'description': 'Модель, описывающая структуру ответа API с ошибкой валидации.', 'properties': {'detail': {'items': {'$ref': '#/$defs/ValidationErrorSchema'}, 'title': 'Detail', 'type': 'array'}}, 'required': ['detail'], 'title': 'ValidationErrorResponseSchema', 'type': 'object'}
